title: Hapuku I
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Sticker

see Signed on bottom, incised: [(surrounding \"RM\" monogram) M
description: rounded, egg-shaped form with organic opening across top; textured overall with raised smooth bumps; organic panels around and below top opening, decorated with small dots of various sizes of brass inlays; large rounded brass inlays on each side at top
creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
